```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
```

## Load data

```{r}
# Combined data
combined <- read.csv("NPP_AMF_combined.csv")

combined <- combined %>%
  mutate(
    Inoculation = factor(Inoculation),
    Polyculture = factor(Polyculture),
    Group = interaction(Inoculation, Polyculture, sep = "_")
  )

```

## Basic analysis

```{r}
# Berry stats
an_berry1 <- aov(Berries_g_pp~Polyculture+Inoculation+Water, data= combined)
summary(an_berry1)

an_berry2 <- aov(Berries_g_pp~Polyculture*Inoculation*Water, data= combined)
summary(an_berry2)

lm_berry2 <- lm(Berries_g_pp~Polyculture*Inoculation*Water, data= combined)
summary(lm_berry2)
```

```{r}
# ANPP stats
an_ANPP1 <- aov(ANPP_g_pp~Polyculture+Inoculation+Water, data= combined)
summary(an_ANPP1)

an_ANPP2 <- aov(ANPP_g_pp~Polyculture*Inoculation*Water, data= combined)
summary(an_ANPP2)

lm_ANPP2 <- lm(ANPP_g_pp~Polyculture*Inoculation*Water, data= combined)
summary(lm_ANPP2)
```

```{r}
# BNPP stats
an_BNPP1 <- aov(BNPP_g_pp~Polyculture+Inoculation+Water, data= combined)
summary(an_BNPP1)

an_BNPP2 <- aov(BNPP_g_pp~Polyculture*Inoculation*Water, data= combined)
```
